Rulings.Base:
1. This card targets 1 "Meklord Army" monster in your GY.
2. If you can't add the target "Meklord Army" monster to your hand, the attack target is not destroyed.
3. If you can't destroy the attack target, you still add the target "Meklord Army" monster to your hand.
4. Adding the target "Meklord Army" monster to your hand and destroying the attack target do not happen at the same time.
5. You add, then destroy.

PSCT.Base: When a "Meklord" monster on the field is targeted for an attack: Target 1 "Meklord Army" monster in your Graveyard; add that target to your hand, then destroy the attack target.
